alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:32PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Cluster of thunderstorms east of Blackfoot and Pocatello moving west in the general direction through 700 PM MDT... At 530 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms east of Blackfoot and Pocatello, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Moderate rain and wind gusts to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Blackfoot, Goshen, Chubbuck, Firth, Rose, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Fort Hall Townsite, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Bone, Fort Hall Putnam Lodge, Groveland, Basalt, Cutthroat Trout Campground, Trail Creek Campground and Wapello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blackfoot Mountains; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
